name: Engineer Mind Template CSS
format:
<style>

.led-button-primary  {
  outline: none;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5em;
  color: white;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 4px 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  min-width: 0px !important;
  min-height: 0px !important;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: background-color 0.6s;   
}

.led-button  {
  outline: none;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5em;
  color: white;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 4px 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  min-width: 0px !important;
  min-height: 0px !important;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: background-color 0.6s;   
}
.on-red {
  background-color: #CC0000;
  box-shadow:  #FF0000 0 0px 9px 9px, inset #00000017 0 -1px 1px 0px !important;
  width: 2.5em !important;
  height: 2.5em !important;
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  transition: box-shadow 0.6s;   
}

.off-red {
  background-color: #C03455;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 3px !important;
  width: 2.5em !important;
  height: 2.5em !important;
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  transition: box-shadow 0.6s;
}

.on-cyan {
  background-color: #5AFFF5;
  box-shadow:  #5AFFF5 0 0px 9px 9px, inset #00000017 0 -1px 1px 0px !important;
  width: 2.5em !important;
  height: 2.5em !important;
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  transition: box-shadow 0.6s;   
}

.off-cyan {
  background-color: #0EA59B;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 3px !important;
  width: 2.5em !important;
  height: 2.5em !important;
  margin: 0.5em !important;
  transition: box-shadow 0.6s;
}

.led-button-primary:hover {
  background-color: #0CDACC;
}


.led-button-primary:active {
  background-color: #5AFFF5;
  box-shadow:  #5AFFF5 0 0px 9px 9px, inset #00000017 0 -1px 1px 0px !important;
  transition: box-shadow 1s;
}

.up {
  background-color: #C03455;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 3px !important;
  width: 2em !important;
  height: 2em !important;
  margin: 0.5em !important;
}

.led-button:hover {
  background-color: #F73315;
}


.led-button:active {
  background-color: #CC0000;
  box-shadow:  #FF0000 0 0px 9px 9px, inset #00000017 0 -1px 1px 0px !important;
  transition: box-shadow 1s;
}

.control-block {
    display: content;
    text-align-last: center;
}

.title {
    text-align: center;
    margin:0.5em;
    min-height: 3em;
}

.text-red {
    color: #CC0000 !important;
    margin-left: 4.5em;
}

.text-cyan {
    color:#5AFFF5 !important;
    margin-left: 4.5em;

}
</style>
